name: IGI Commando Shooter Snow War
description:
Commando Shooter is a striking action FPS game! True 3D graphics and sound effects, allowing you to experience the real sniper experience. The game brings an exciting experience to complete the task.
Once you start shooting, the enemy will know your presence, search for you everywhere, attack you.
This is a special ops mission of evil enemy’s assassination that will let you experience & use battle survival & gun shooting skills in intense & eventful war snow environment.
